section.title: Kinematic, Diffusion, and Dynamic Wave Approaches
section.para: In this section, the routing techniques based on the dynamic wave or simplifications of the dynamic wave will be discussed. The focus in this section will be on one-dimensional approaches (2d will be discussed in the next section). Included in the discussion will be the assumptions and conceptualisations that are needed for application of these approaches. It is suspected that this section may need to be split into three subsections when the text is completed.
